meanings.sent1: The ancient artifacts had intricate Egyptian designs.
meanings.sent2: The Egyptian pyramids are famous worldwide.
meanings.sent3: The Egyptian sun seemed to smile down on the travelers.
meanings.sent4: Her elegance was as regal as an Egyptian queen.
meanings.sent5: The scent of lotus flowers filled the Egyptian air.

meanings.definition: A native or inhabitant of Egypt.
meanings.sent1: The Egyptian welcomed the tourists with a warm smile.
meanings.sent2: An Egyptian farmer tended to his crops in the field.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous Egyptian cat played with a ball of yarn.
meanings.sent4: She moved through the crowd like an Egyptian in her own land.
meanings.sent5: The Egyptian shared stories of ancient traditions with the visitors.

meanings.definition: The Afro-Asiatic language of ancient Egypt.
meanings.sent1: Studying Egyptian helps understand ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent2: The hieroglyphics were part of the Egyptian language.
meanings.sent3: The parrot mimicked the sounds of Egyptian spoken by tourists.
meanings.sent4: Her words flowed like an ancient Egyptian river.
meanings.sent5: The echoes of Egyptian chants filled the temple walls.
